email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Verify Your PayPal Account Now

Dear Valued PayPal Customer,

We are writing to inform you that we have detected some suspicious activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account and prevent any unauthorized transactions, we kindly ask you to verify your account information immediately.

Please click on the link below to verify your account:

[Phishing link]

It is important that you complete this verification process as soon as possible to avoid any disruptions to your account. Failure to verify your account within 24 hours may result in a temporary suspension of your PayPal account.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team for assistance. Thank you for your cooperation in helping us keep your account safe and secure.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team

Please note: PayPal will never ask for your password or personal information via email. If you receive any suspicious emails claiming to be from PayPal, please forward them to spoof@paypal.com for investigation.
